thread.title: Release the outrage! Comedian Ilana Glazer loses it over pic of Ivanka and son
thread.title_full: Release the outrage! Comedian Ilana Glazer loses it over pic of Ivanka and son

author: Sarah D.
title: Release the outrage! Comedian Ilana Glazer loses it over pic of Ivanka and son
text:
Yesterday, First Daughter Ivanka Trump sent out this adorable photo of her and her son Theodore: Taking a call in the White House with my personal assistant Theodore. ❤ pic.twitter.com/7BY5jef0gw 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 7, 2017 
That was just a little more than “Broad City” star Ilana Glazer could handle: . @IvankaTrump is this a joke?? you are making a mockery of women, working mothers, and moms who are homemakers w/o additional careers. 
— ilana glazer (@ilazer) February 7, 2017 
You know, for an alleged comedian, Ilana Glazer doesn’t seem to have much of a sense of humor. Or a strong grip on reality, for that matter. @ilazer @IvankaTrump how is this making a mockery of anyone? 
— Tim Gluck (@timgluck) February 8, 2017 @ilazer @IvankaTrump How on earth is she doing that? Relax for goodness' sake.
